maintenanceTips: - Clean the screen with a microfiber cloth. - Charge your phone when the battery reaches 20%. - Avoid exposing the phone to extreme temperatures. - Regularly back up your data.
- Ensure your laptop is charged regularly. - Clean the fan to prevent overheating. - Avoid eating or drinking near the laptop.
- Store your headphones in a case to prevent damage. - Avoid tangling the wires to keep them in good condition.
- Keep your TV away from direct sunlight. - Clean the screen with a microfiber cloth. - Avoid static electricity buildup.
